security: Disclosing the details of meetings with MXWINDFALL/1, including locations, times, and operational discussions, could compromise the agent and the operation. Additionally, revealing the planned trips to Russia, China, and Brazil, along with the agent's contacts in the aerosol industry, could expose intelligence-gathering efforts against CBW and nuclear proliferation targets. As indicated: "W/1 HAS MADE IMPRESSIVE CONTACTS IN THE AEROSOL INDUSTRY IN RUSSIA, CHINA AND BRAZIL...SHOULD BE ABLE TO OBTAIN GOOD FI AGAINST CBW TARGETS AND NUCLEAR PROLIFERATION TARGETS."
summary: A contact report details a meeting between a case officer (C/O) and MXWINDFALL/1, discussing travel opportunities to Russia, China, and Brazil for intelligence gathering, and noting MXWINDFALL/1's interest in JFK assassination theories.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET contact report, dated December 27, 1994, outlines a meeting between a case officer (C/O) using the alias Zachary T. Huntington, and MXWINDFALL/1 at MXWINDFALL/1's home and a Chinese restaurant in Narragansett, Rhode Island. The discussions included potential trips to Russia, China, and Brazil for MXWINDFALL/1 to attend conferences and gather intelligence related to CBW and nuclear proliferation targets, specifically leveraging contacts in the aerosol industry. The report also mentions MXWINDFALL/1's extensive interest in the JFK assassination, which the C/O believes is a way for MXWINDFALL/1 to cope with loneliness after the loss of his wife and his daughter going to college.
title: CONTACT REPORT - MXWINDFALL/1 (201-1224541)
